price: 63.Hinnak Nabiyow A-korosuk Yallat agleytah haytaanamih qibaada tayse innaa, hinnay barrii kee baddi diteetak gita siinih yascasseeh, isi Racmatak (rob kinnuk) foocat aytikumah caacooya siinih ruuba Yalli yayseeh? Ah abeh yan Yallâ luk yaqbuden Yalli yanii? (mayan) Yalli fayya iyyeeh saytunnooweh agleh kaat hayya haanamak keenik ixxic.
arabic: أَمَّن يَهۡدِيكُمۡ فِي ظُلُمَٰتِ ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَمَن يُرۡسِلُ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦٓۗ أَءِلَٰهٞ مَّعَ ٱللَّهِۚ تَعَٰلَى ٱللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: amman yahdīkum fī ẓulumāti al-bari wal-baḥri waman yur'silu al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi a-ilāhun maʿa al-lahi taʿālā al-lahu ʿammā yush'rikūna
